scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
scripts.transpile: yarn clean && node ./lib/style-dictionary/build.mjs && tsc && copyfiles -u 1 tmp/**/*.css dist/ && rm -rf tmp
scripts.transpile-changes: node ./lib/style-dictionary/build.mjs && tsc -b && copyfiles -u 1 tmp/**/*.css dist/ && rm -rf tmp
